website_summaries.verdict: An affordable eyebrow pencil with versatile shades that look natural on most consumers.
pros: Has a fine tip that makes it easy to define and fill in brows
Fairly easy for most users to find a good color match
Comes in taupe that works for different hair colors
cons: May smudge throughout the day, requiring touch ups

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brow products!
customer_reviews.text: NYX is my absolute favorite when it comes to brow products. I’ve tried so many brow products and they’re always either too creamy or too dry. The formula for this products is just perfect for both natural and dramatic looks. And the tips stay so precise throughout use. Some tips: be conscious of what cap you’re putting into what end and make sure to roll down the pencil before capping it again. Pics include with one eyebrow done and then with both brows done.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Only one i use. Its make my brows look super natural
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brows!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried sooo many brow liners and gels over the years but have never found the perfect one. That all changed when I purchased this! The pencil is so fine that it literally draws on like a pencil to where I can outline exactly how I would like my brows to be shaped and simply fill them in with powder after. I highly, highly recommend this product to anyone trying to get a crisp, clean brow shape.
customer_reviews.author: Auna Berardi

customer_reviews.title: Choose this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice! I have the ash brown. My hair is auburn and it goes nicely together. I was afraid the pencil may be too harsh because I normally use a powder but it wasn't! The pencil gave me control and made the application more precise and the brow very defined but still natural. It has a creamy texture that I think helps with the natural look as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Taupe is perfect for senior brows.
customer_reviews.text: I am re-ordering right now. I've been experimenting with lots of brow pencils, as I find that at age 67, my once bushy brows are disappearing, not uncommon for older people. This has been best performing for me + the color is not too dark, very compatible with my own silvery/light brown hair; + stays put, no stray powder, wears well through the day, ; + easy to apply and control line-- firmer than kohl but softer than a pencil -- just don't raise the inner stick too high so it won't snap off.
customer_reviews.author: avid rita

customer_reviews.title: The expresso is the one I'm using and I like it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three different colors. I'm not sure if they're going to allow me to review all three and I'm not sure which one this is but I bought ash brown, brunette and espresso. ash brown and brunettes are basically the same color it's just Burnette is a little warmer in color. Espresso is closer to my eyebrow color but still a bit light. Ash brown and brunette isn't the color that it appears online. They're definitely a lot lighter. But application is a breeze. He's really helped me step up my eyebrow game because honestly I was horrible but it was the tools and products I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: Great for ashy brunettes
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brow pencil that’s affordable and has a “cool” brown shade. Most browns were too “warm” and reddish for my skin and hair color. Olive skin tone and light brown hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DUPE FOR HIGH END PENCILS
customer_reviews.text: I love NYX micro brow. The ash brown color is a really close to dupe for Anastasia Beverly Hills, for a lot less. I also feel like it gives me the perfect control to really shape my eyebrows, get good points at the end and fill in without it looking too heavy. In fact I usually do a second fill in with the Nyx brow powder which is also a great dupe and seems to last forever. I've been using the stuff for years now but the compliments seem to keep on coming :-) I've also found that in LA, between Target Ulta and Amazon, Amazon reliably has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Mh

customer_reviews.title: Only difference between these NYX pencils and Anastasia is the shades!
customer_reviews.text: These micro tip eyebrow pencils are great. For someone who goes through these "micro eyebrow pencils" a little fast (losing them, breaking the tips off, etc.), they're great and much gentler on the pocket book than the higher end brands. They are a different set of shades than the other brands, so make sure you have tested them out or understand that NYX taupe isn't going to be the same as the Anastasia taupe. These have more neutral tones than Anastasia. If you haven't tried this line before, I would suggest you give it a go. It's relatively inexpensive, so it may be worth it to buy a few similar shades and see what works best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey E. Kline

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so great. I looked up swatches of the different colors ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so great. I looked up swatches of the different colors to pick the right one for me, usually its a safe bet to go a shade or two lighter than your hair color, and this worked out perfectly. The pencil may not be super fine tip because its a wind up, but I think its definite sufficient and so much less waste than a traditional wood one. Much faster to apply than powder and eliminates the need for brow wax, in my opinion. The spooly on the opposite end makes this super convenient for travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I am dark skinned, and have been using the shade espresso for years. It is more pricey than others, but its worth it. The pencil is very fine so you can mimic perfect hair stroke and line the shape of your eyebrows very well. I either use the pencil by itself, or pair with my ABH pomade in ebony. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah D.

customer_reviews.title: Good but Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: The pencil and spoolie are great. But the pencil only lasted me through 8 uses. Again it's a great product but for $10 I expected a lot more use out of it especially since I don't use heavy application :/
customer_reviews.author: Odile Irakiza

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow pencil for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I hardly have any eyebrows from being blonde and overplucking when I was younger. I tried microblading but it essentially disappeared after a year. I was using a much more expensive brand ($25!) and thought I'd give NYX a chance because of the price.. I figured if I hated it, oh well, it was cheap and now I know. BUT, it is now my absolute favorite pencil! It stays all day and the tip is thin so you can fill your brows will thinner brow like strokes as opposed to the hard lines alot of pencils create. This is my new go-to. I order a new one once a month!
customer_reviews.author: JRKnick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Price, GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine point, then twist-crayon kind-and has a brow brush at the end. Just be sure to match the right color 2-3x darker for blondes and 2-3xshades lighter for brunette or black hair. I’m a blonde and I chose the dark brown and it looks natural-well, just make sure you dont use a ton of pressure with a dark pencil if you have light hair! Great product, got here so fast, and though it was the cheapest one I could find, it’s definitely worth more than more expensive brow pencils and gels. At least in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great eyebrow pencil!
customer_reviews.text: I like it BETTER than Anastasia Brow Wiz, and it's about 1/3 the price! It goes on easier, looks better, and I can wake up the next morning and it's usually still on. The Brow Wiz I was using could sometimes be embarrassing because if I itched my eyebrow or rubbed it, it might just wipe off. This stuff doesn't wipe off that easily. DEFINITELY will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite eye brow pencil. Non-smudging, extra fine tip that never needs sharpening at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as or even better than Anastasia of Beverly Hills which I had been using for years and is > $20. The NYX tip is truly micro, and I like the harder consistency better than the Anastasia because I found the Anastasia to be a bit too soft to make extra fine brush marks. I find the marks from this pencil more difficult to rub off than the Anastasia, even in high heat and humidity. So glad I found this pencil; great price for a better performing product. No more Anastasia for me.
customer_reviews.author: new yorker

customer_reviews.title: A COMPLETE DIFF BRAND!!!
customer_reviews.text: Want even the right brand! It is a micro pencil, and is taupe, like i ordered, but it better live up to my fav NYX micro pencil!! I will update but never buy from here again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JessaNae

customer_reviews.title: ash brown is the perfect shade. my hair is a light/med brown and ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I've gotten - after trying soo many different brow pencils finally found the right one. ash brown is the perfect shade. my hair is a light/med brown and natural brows are even lighter. this has a nice hue.. not too dark not chesnut, no red tones. applies well and with precision. think the first one lasted me a month or so. stays put all day too! will continue buying this
customer_reviews.author: heather roggenbuck

customer_reviews.title: Not for bare brows
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a pencil, so it scratched my skin. It may be good for filling in brows that exist. But, for chemo patients or hypothyroid victims where the brow hairs are gone, it’s not something I’d encourage. In these cases I’d encourage a gel-like product. I like easy breezy brows by Cover Girl. You pay a bit more (not much more), it’s easy to apply, buildable, stays on once set, and doesn’t scratch your skin.
customer_reviews.author: popcornfrenzy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil! I had been buying "blonde" for ages and always felt the color was too red. I finally caught into this universal color from someone who has almost black hair! I never believed we could use the same color but it was just what I needed. If it lasted all day, off get a full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin D

customer_reviews.title: Anastasia brow wiz doupe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Anastasia brow wiz doupe! I have a hard time finding a good color to match my eyebrows. They're an ashy dark blonde color. Most pencils are too orange or dark. The taupe color is perfect! Lasts all day and is easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew&Bridget Murray

customer_reviews.title: Go to brow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I have very light blonde eyebrows (read:white eyebrows) and blonde (golden with undertones of red) hair. The blonde pencil is perfect and makes my brows match my hair. It's really easy to use for people just starting off and looks pretty natural. This was my first time purchasing off Amazon as I usually go to my local Ulta. I bought on Amazon for the fast shipping because I realized too late that I was almost out and wouldn't be able to get to a store soon enough. Package arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brow pencil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brow pencil! I have been using a pencil that was $25 and lasted a month. Decided to order the NYX pencil for days I would be bumming around to save my good pencil. However, the NYX brow pencil is my good one now!!! My brows disappeared in my 40’s, so I draw complete brows everyday. This pencil is thin for good control and it has staying power, even on my oily skin. I have medium blonde hair and use the ash brown. The taupe was a little light for my liking. I am so happy to have found this pencil! Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: mytwopups

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would be an eyebrow pencil sort of gal, but this changed my mind! I was seeking an affordable pencil to use as a beginner and stumbled across this- it changed my eyebrow game forever. Easy to apply, just twist to get more pencil. I LOVE the brush end. I use the brush to straighten up my eyebrows even if I'm not applying the pencil that day. I've never had this pencil smudge either (I do use a setting spray when I'm finished with my makeup though). Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I bought to do my eyebrows, I’ve used brown eyeliner and eyeshadow before but it wasn’t great. So I finally decided to buy an eyebrow pencil. And it’s great! The only complaint is that if i get it above my eyebrow by accident, one swipe from my finger takes it completely off. So I’m not sure how easy it is to take it off from actual eyebrows. Haven’t really tested it much.
customer_reviews.author: Tayla Anderson Robichaud

customer_reviews.title: Good color match
customer_reviews.text: Color is perfect for some one trying to find a match For eyebrows that are really dark brown but black pencil is too dark. Ash brown has been the best I’ve found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite brow products
customer_reviews.text: I used to by the Anastasia brand micro brow pencil for 5x the cost of this pencil and they are on par with each other for quality. Since I found these I have not bought another Anastasia micro pencil. I did receive 1 that was broken and the whole pencil part just kind of fell out but it could have happened with any of these since it is so thin and fragile. Just check that its not broken and falling out when you get it and you should be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle NTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Eyebrow Pencil
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine introduced me to this product a few years ago and I absolutely love it. The micro pencil makes for a very natural look and is easy to use. I have blonde hair but darker eyebrows and I use the taupe color. I do my eyebrows everyday so naturally I go through these a bit fast. I was purchasing them at Target for about $10.00. So glad that I can get them on Amazon for a few dollars cheaper and without the hassle of going into a store :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil! I had been using the Benefit brow pencil but that’s just not in my budget anymore. I decided to give this a try and holy crap I love it! I have very skinny brows due to overplucking when the skinny brow trend was in wayy back in the day and this makes it so easy to fill them in without looking fake. This has deff become a staple in my everyday makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: RUFKM?!?! Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The NYX eyebrow pencil is actually a fantastic product. I bought three of them from Amazon, to have on hand. All three of them have only provided one or two applications and then been empty. I suspect that someone orders their new ones, then returns their old ones on Prime. This may be an item best purchased at your local beauty supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: The Color Was Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. I need a new eyebrow pencil/thingy. I hoped this would be the one. I ordered the blonde because I have stopped coloring my hair and it's completely gray/white now. I need a light pencil.. But this one was orange-yellow. Almost the color of washed out red hair. I needed a very very light brown - not orange-yellow. Needless to say I was disappointed. If it had been a good color, I would probably have liked it. So if you get a darker brown you may like it very much. Hard for me to say.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBrownBear900

customer_reviews.title: ***UPDATED REVIEW!!
customer_reviews.text: This pencil is everything I was looking for in an eyebrow pencil. The only thing I don't like it that I feel like it runs out pretty fast (I buy one every month) but for the price, I can't complain. EDIT: They started increase the price too much and it’s not worth it to me. I switched to the NYX brow powder pencil and it is by far THE BEST eyebrow pencil I have ever had. It’s long-lasting AND one pencil lasts me for THREE months with just about daily usage and it’s bigger than this one.
customer_reviews.author: User101

customer_reviews.title: The point is very fine and the brush works great
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a brow pencil that works well. I haven't tried the Anastasia one, but this does look exactly the same. The point is very fine and the brush works great. I wish there was a perfect color between dark brown and black. I have the black and it is fine since my brow hair is very dark, but the parts where it goes on the skin to even out the shape looks too dark and clearly drawn on. However, it's the best I've found so far and I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W

customer_reviews.title: Espresso Didn't Live Up To Its Name
customer_reviews.text: I was immediately disappointed by the color of the pencil. I ordered espresso and got a weird shade of brown that's nothing like espresso. I expected it to be brownish black. I also expected a more precise pencil. I mean, it wasn't even pointy to begin with. I tried it on my light olive skin and it was too... almost rusty-chocolate brown, with more emphasis on the rust. I had to add an old Maybelline black pencil to make it look more natural. The only thing I liked was that it wasn't too hard, leaving too much of an obvious line or too frustratingly hard. I guess the search goes on for the "perfect" brow product. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Powerpuffed

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Best on the market for nonprofessional use. The micro point on this pencil makes eyebrows appear more natural by giving the user the ability to draw fine strokes like real brow hairs. Being natural blonde it is difficult for me to find a brow pencil that enables me natural looking brows and after decades of this battle I have finally won that fight with the dark brown shade being best.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia June

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!! Delivered what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve really liked my brow pencil! I bought a more expensive one later and this one has outlasted that one by FAR because in that one most of it broke off and basically got wasted! So this one stays in place and doesn’t roll up too much product ! Fine line although wish it could sharpen some as it comes out.... after you use the tip does get slightly rounded therefore you lose some of the fine line definition. Just a suggestion that I’d find valuable as a customer if a company did that . But overall I love it .
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY I FOUND THIS ON AMAZON! A++++ Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Burnette shade and it worked so well with my face tone. It was such a great price, came in just a couple days and I am just so happy I never have to go to Sephora or ULTA to buy an expensive brand eye brow retractable pencil! A++++ purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Chaneco

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to prestige cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: Colors are nice and natural. I've used this pencil for years. I've used more expensive ones, different application styles and colors. I always coming back to this one and now it's the only one I'll use. I use it daily and it last me roughly a month. I love the ash brown as it matches great with many hair colors if you don't prefer using brown for a dark look. I very rarely have issues with it breaking unless I roll it out too much. Stays all day and doesn't flake.
customer_reviews.author: Rich & Casey

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyebrow pencil ever
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyebrow pencil ever. I have already gone through four or five of these. Not enough product in my opinion especially since the pencil is so thin as it is but it is my favorite!!! I buy mine in espresso and it takes me five min to do my eyebrows just how I like them. It doesn’t itch like other eyebrow products make me itch and it doesn’t wear away during the day. The color is naturally and the pencil is thin enough that i can make hair strokes. I would suggest using a face primer first and then putting this on as it will provide more grip and darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very fine pencil tip produces realistic, exquisite, and lasting results!
customer_reviews.text: The very thin pencil has the finest tip, a dream to use! The results are exquisite, if you know how to draw realistic individual eyebrow hair. The strokes stay on, don't fade, and need no touching up all day. You rotate the pencil part of tip to advance it. This very thin pencil is light, so it is incredibly easy to hold between your fingers and move around. The brush too is fine and can remove or blend without encroaching into other areas. Good staying power, and no smudging. Always put the cap back on to prevent tip from drying out even if it doesn't dry out easily. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ClairedeLune

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brow Pencil for Your Purse
customer_reviews.text: This is my purse brow pencil and I absolutely love it! This brow pencil doesn't smudge, smear, melt, etc. It's very easy to use and has a brush on the other end to help you achieve a natural, yet flawless brow slay! You can use this for everyday wear or for a full-glam look! I usually restock every three months or so. It lasts for a while! Follow me on IG at @itsbrilew to see some of the looks with this pencil!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Lew

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to higher end brands.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t last too long if you do your brows everyday. If you have oily skin, be careful because smudging is very probable. They price isn’t so expensive like ABH or top name brands and they do a pretty similar job. I’ll be rebuying these soon!
customer_reviews.author: Esmie

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 46yo and over plucked my brows back in the 90s like most did, and have consistently struggled with over the years . I've used IT cosmetics, ABH, you name it.. Come to find out out of sheer desperation, this NYX at only a fraction of the price, is hands down the best and easiest I have ever used.. idk what I would do if the stopped making this! You cannot go wrong with this, and by far the easiest to draw brows that look natural.. with minimal effort! You will not be disappointed in this product..
customer_reviews.author: T.rok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brow pencil at the perfect price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the NYX eyebrow pencil because I couldn’t justify spending $20+ on the Anastasia Beverly Hills pencil again. Although the ABH brow pencil has been my go to for a couple years now, I decided to give this a try because of the price and good reviews. It did the job for me just as well as an ABH brow pencil, and also came as a set of 3 brow pencils (not sure if I was supposed to get 3, but I’m not mad about it). I’ll probably be buying this from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it's fake! This product was hard, crumbly, and made me break out.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving a 2 stars purely because I am hoping it is a dud that I received. This is my first time purchasing this brand eyebrow products. I was hoping for a quicker fix than my Anastasia brow pomade. The pencil was super dry and hard. It has so difficult to draw even single hairs. To make matters worse, I don't have particularly sensitive skin, but this made me break out along me eyebrows with white heads! So not cool. I bought full price, so I thought it was unlikely I'd get a fake, but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to brow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I was spending about $25 on the Benefit brow pencil and that's just stupid expensive. Someone on Instagram linked this and thought it was worth a try and this is now my go-to. I bought the taupe which is often a hit or miss color but it's basically the same color as my #3 Benefit color. I have dirty blonde hair with brown eyebrows and this is the perfect color pencil. Not too dark, not too light. I use this pretty much every day and it lasted me about a month, not super long but I'm okay with that. If you're not sure if you should try this out, buy it. I'm so happy I found this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & so affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time purchasing this. I used to use the Too Faced chocolate brownie eyebrow pencil, which I do LOVE! It smells like chocolate, but it’s like $28. I’m a stay at home mom w 2 kids, I can’t afford designer brands as much anymore, but I love NYX products. This eyebrow pencil is a perfect replacement and much more affordable. I love the precise tip, I can draw individual hairs and then blend it with the little spoolie. Def recommend this and the NYX brand in general.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: The blonde didn’t match as much as I was expecting but it is still useful and nice to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blonde color but I think I would have liked a darker color. The color is more of a golden egg color on my skin and doesn’t match my eyebrow hairs as much as I would have hoped, but it’s a nice pencil to have on-the-go when you aren’t going for a really structured brow makeup look. I have dirty blonde hair and my eyebrows are darker and ashen. It’s a little difficult to find a color that is closer to my natural brow color and the brunette colors are more red. Colors aside, it goes on similar to a crayon and is relatively sheer. I go over a couple times for more intensity.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Spies

customer_reviews.title: Ash brown perfect neutral brown
customer_reviews.text: I switched from ABH brow wiz to this! They are nearly identical. I honestly think they work the exact same. I think I will continue to buy this from now on and not buy ABH again. I have medium ash brown hair with blonde highlights and got ash brown color. It matches my brows perfectly. No red tones. Very neutral.
customer_reviews.author: LeeTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, this product is a great price, however the formula is not good. It was very dry and did not work very well. You have to press hard and go over it a bunch of times for it to actually show up. It literally felt like a colored pencil. Also, ordering online is not the best idea. The one I ordered did not match my color very well. I have dirty blonde hair and ordered taupe after looking at other reviews. I should have ordered the soft brown.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a micro thin pencil and perfect color
customer_reviews.text: I'm older and have thinning eyebrows. I've used a brush and powder for my eyebrows, and a brown pencil and a few other pencils -- none worked that well. This is exactly what I was looking for. I can make small hair lines and the color is perfect (not too dark like the brown I've used). I look like I have professional brows - the look I was wanting, finally. I will definitely continue buying this one! I'm a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Beeb

customer_reviews.title: I have eyebrows!
customer_reviews.text: Like many, back in the day I plucked my eyebrows until I almost didn't have any. I tried products to try to regrow them and nothing. I found this and wanted something that would look natural and give me back my eyebrows (if only temporarily). This stuff is amazing and the price is great. I just use a little to add color and no one would know that these aren't my real brows. Very happy. I keep extras on hand, just in case!
customer_reviews.author: D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: More red than expected but still great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. The only "con" is that it's a little more red than my hair. I have very dark red/auburn hair color and this is a little brighter than my hair. However, this is not the companies fault. They just don't offer a shade that fits my hair color perfectly. So I use a powder to go over the brow pencil to help darken it a little. Works perfectly then!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Alt

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow filler
customer_reviews.text: This has helped me step up my eyebrow game! I'm so glad I bought it. I got mine in the color espresso, but should have went one shade darker. Either way, it's much easier for me to outline and fill in my brows now and they look much better. The attached photo is my eyebrows without any professional shaping. I outlined the natural shape of my brows and then tweezed and trimmed around it and filled it in. Imagine how great they would look with a professional shaping. This eyebrow pencil is GREAT. I have several, this is the best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: LaFonda Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great low-budget dupe! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm a huge fan of the Urban Decay Brow Beater and the Anastasia Brow Wiz products. They're my go-to brow product, but they're a bit pricey. Not everyone can afford to (or even wants to) spend $20-30 per brow pencil. I wanted to see if this was reasonable substitute.... And I'm so glad I tried it! You get essentially the same quality look and feel for a fraction of the cost. Can't speak yet on how long one pencil lasts compared to the other brands, as I've only used it a few times. But, overall, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: I am a light brown or dirty blonde. My brows are very light blonde
customer_reviews.text: It's orange, not blonde. I will stick to my brown and just work to lighten it. I am a light brown or dirty blonde. My brows are very light blonde.
customer_reviews.author: SassySissie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but the product runs out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: The pencil paints very well. The makeup last longer than many other products, especially when getting wet. The micro pen allows for nice and natural definition. However, what I don’t like is that the manufacturers seems to be ripping us off when only fills out the pencil housing with like half of the actual product. So I ended up having to buy this pencil very often because it runs out quickly. So for me no worth it the money. Instead I recently got permanent eyebrow make up by a recomended profesional and is much better investment and now I avoid the daily hassle of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Saved so much money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new eyebrow pencil so much! I saved like $15 since I usually buy Anastasia Beverly Hills and it’s actually very comparable to that product. High quality! I bought taupe and I actually look like a blonde when I wear this. Other brands go straight from light blonde to brown, I like that there is an in-between for us ash blondes!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Burtch

customer_reviews.title: Better than ABH
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have bought ABH brow wiz for years and recently decided to try to find a dupe because at $21 a pop, it's kind of getting old especially when you bulk order. This, in my opinion is better than ABH! If you have issues with it not staying or being too waxy (which I have not experienced) before you apply your brow product try dusting on a light layer of setting powder over your eyebrows and then apply this! I use RCMA setting powder. This is over 3X cheaper than ABH and does the exact same thing as ABH and is BETTER!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa ann

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every single day! Easy to use and on its own since my skins a little oily they kinda fade just a tad bit but I usually use Anastasias dipbrow first in brown and since I don’t have much eyebrow hairs, I use a darker shade of nyx micro brow and add it to the spots where I have no hair to make it look like I have some. So in the end it doesn’t look weird and I always get compliments on my brows.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, but after a very, very few uses, it was all gone or malfunctioning so that there was no more pencil. Used probably less than 10 applications. Basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Vienne Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Great brow pencil!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brow pencil, especially for the price! It is very easy to apply, not too hard or too soft, and the color is perfectly pigmented. I am really happy with this purchase and will continue to buy this brand! There is no need to spend a ton more money on sephora brand-type brow pencils when this one works just as well!
customer_reviews.author: JgoffTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so many different eyebrow products and this is by far my favorite. The pencil is smooth and very easy to blend out
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Monroe

customer_reviews.title: which is perfect! Short strokes with some blending- just as good ...
customer_reviews.text: I have jet black hair and I use a darker brown color in the Anastasia pencil, so went with the darkest brown option here. However, this is MUCH lighter than what I'm used to with Anastasia.. Ended up giving to my friend and bought the black one, which is perfect! Short strokes with some blending- just as good as the Anastasia pencil but much more affordable considering I go through one pencil every month or so.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: I love how thin this pencil is for precision and a better look. The color is what really sold me on it - I usually get blonde eyebrow pencils for my dark/dirty blonde hair but they usually have a bit of a golden undertone, same with brown ones have a warm undertone. This is actually the ashy dark blonde color and looks much better with the ashy bleached hair I have. It also has lasted me a surprisingly long time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great dupe for Anastasia Brow Wiz!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't justify spending money on Anastasia anymore, so I tried this and it's basically the same thing. I used "soft brown" in Anastasia and got "ash brown" in NYX and it's soooo similar!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Justanothergirl

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: This is my FAV eyebrow pencil for daily use. I have some dark Portuguese eyebrows (yay) so I’m glad that thick full brows have come back in to style. However, I have some thin spots and hairs that grow weird. This pencil fills them in great. I’ve tried the gels and the oils and the 3-day waterproof stuff and they all just didn’t work well or became too gunky. This pencil is easy to use, retractable with a spoolie to distribute product and tame hairs. Very good find!
customer_reviews.author: Boodaroo_23

customer_reviews.title: Product gone in 14 days
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. I loved the pencil and how thin it was but it didn’t last for that long I just ordered it two weeks ago and recieved after four days which is not bad. If you see in the video the white stick is where the product is and it’s not even half of it the product is So small it’s crazy I wouldn’t recommend buying this. It’s a wast of money who wants to buy this if it only last a week. I would recommend just getting a wood pencil,that last me MONTHS no lie. Also you can see where the product end, where the zig zap part is
customer_reviews.author: Kamiyah

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried countless of brow pencils and this one is the only one that lasts and has a natural look to it. I have dark brown brows, so to go for a natural look, I buy the "Black" pencil. It really lasts through out the day. I work in a hardware store so it does get crazy, and even through stress sweat, dust, and long hours in the sun, the product is still there looking as good as I applied it. The brow pencil arrived on time. One brow pencil can last me about 3 months with almost everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Dupe for ABH
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the closest match for my natural red hair that I’ve found in a less expensive option. I had been using ABH but $20 for something I go through rather quickly wasn’t cost effective. This applies as easily as the ABH, very similar shade and doesn’t seem all that fragile given the precise point of the pencil. It’s a perfect dupe for a lot less $.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blood-Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Too hard.
customer_reviews.text: The pencil would have been fine, except that it was rock hard and I had to practically scrape my skin to apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Lena E

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is my very favorite eyebrow pencil. It definitely compares to high end, so save yourself the money and try this.
customer_reviews.author: Celena

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed, I am a It eyebrow pencil follower and I was looking for something similar. The only reason I don't give it a 5 star review it's because you can tell the spoolie is very flimsy and closing the product can be difficult at times. Overall, yes buy it!
customer_reviews.author: C.D.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Anastasia Beverly Hills/Benefit brow pencils! Even better! and cheaper!🙌
customer_reviews.text: As a high-end makeup up junkie, I ended up trying this eyebrow pencil way too late! I have spent hundreds on Anastasia,Fenti, and Benefit brow pencils (20$+ each) and have been pretty satisfied. I had ordered my next benefit brow pencil ($24) from Sephora online, but it was a week out and I was desperate, so I ordered this pencil to use until it arrived. THIS IS MY NEW FAVORITE EYEBROW PENCIL. It looks natural and it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: macmamma25

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of your color choice
customer_reviews.text: This pencil is easy to use BUT the color was all wrong. When I purchase something labeled "espresso", it is because it's (usually) as close to the color black as you can get. This espresso colored pencil was actually the color of coffee with a touch of milk. I have ordered the black because I do like how it goes on so, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A.

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like it was old, dried out didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond disappointed and upset that I received my brow liner and it was completely dried out. When I went to apply the entire tip just broke off! It wouldn't even translate onto my skin. I really was looking forward to actually trying this product too, since I've read so many good reviews. Guess I just wasted my money. And my Birthday is coming up. What a bummer. 😭
customer_reviews.author: jgraham086

customer_reviews.title: very fine tipped brow liner
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how thin this pencil is when i got it. I had never tried a liner this thin before. I was pleasantly surprised. It gives great precision and allows me to perfectly shape my brows. Using such a fine tip allows me to make hair like strokes. On the down side it seems to be wearing down fast and wont last very long.... but I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Taupe works when no other color will
customer_reviews.text: Bought the taupe because every other color I've used is either too light or too severe for my fair skin and medium brown hair and I hit the jackpot. I prefer the super skinny pencil so I can 'draw' on little hairs and this has staying power, esp if I use NYX eyeshadow primer on my brows. This is what I've been looking for for years!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I got this in black and thought it would be too dark but applying with a light hand looks so natural. I've been using ash brown but it was time to change colors since I'm transitioning from mocha brown hair to my natural grey/silver. The only thing I don't like is that it comes off if I accidentally rub my eyebrows because of my oily skin. Baking and powdering helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pigment broke & constantly fell out of pencil.
customer_reviews.text: The pigment stick was broken out of the plastic pencil/tube piece, so every time I took off the cap the pigment would fall out and I’d have to find it & put it back in the tube to use it. The fastener for the pigment stick is inside the plastic contraption on a swivel thing, so you can’t melt it back together without ripping apart the whole plastic tube, making it useless yet again. It’s also a ridiculously tiny amount of product, if you do your brows everyday it probably wouldn’t last more than two weeks. Their precision flat pencil is so much better, I’d recommend that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jelle18

customer_reviews.title: A+ eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I'm someone with dark blonde hair who became a dark brunette, so naturally I have to fill in my brows. This pencil is an excellent dupe for the Anastasia Brow Wiz. It goes on easily and stays on all day. I once had a woman give me a scalp massage during a pedicure and rub my eyebrows...the pencil stayed. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gump

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: When i tell you i have tried every pencil when it comes to drug store make up. This is by far the best yet. I work in food so my face tends to get a lil oily an this stays on for my whole 10-12 hr shifts. Ima manager at my job so im moving around. I have bought the expresso color faithfully every month. Walmart it's $10 so i even save couple dollars
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Works for dark eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I dyed my hair and wanted to get a pencil the color of my hair. This actually works for my dark brows to lighten them up. I get them waxed and trimmed so they aren't very thick and I don't know if it works as well with thicker dark brows.
customer_reviews.author: jujumama

customer_reviews.title: Small point
customer_reviews.text: Overall its not a bad product. It does last and its easy to apply. However I do not plan to purchase again due to the color being lighter than I think it should be and the smaller point on the pencil. Its time consuming to apply and the taupe shade is much lighter than other brands I've used. I would recommend the taupe shade for a dirty blonde. Its far too light for my light brown hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Slim point, great color, long lasting, but product is a bit stiff to apply.
customer_reviews.text: The taupe shade is great and the spoolie brush on the other end of the pencil is good. This eyebrow pencil is long lasting and the fine point is perfect for eyebrows. My only complaint is that the actual product is fairly hard, not something that you gently and smoothly apply, but more like you're firmly drawing in order to get it to show up. It works for my purposes so not a huge downside, just something to note.
customer_reviews.author: Jan van Eyck

customer_reviews.title: Brow savior
customer_reviews.text: The only brow pencil I'll use for the rest of my life. I love how it's thin so I can get the little spots where I'm lacking in brow hair. Last week the cashier kept staring at me and it turns out she was just admiring my brows. YAAAASS. Thats every womens favorite compliment. I wish I can use the clap emoji on amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: So this is definitely not your typical blonde shade but I am a dark strawberry blonde and it is absolutely perfect for me. Ive never actually had an eyebrow pencil or pomade that remotely came close to my natural color and the shades for redheads are just.. not natural looking enough for me. I use this more for the color since my eyebrows are sooo blonde compared to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best eye pencil out there!
customer_reviews.text: ABH who? This eye pencil is everything and so affordable. It's so easy to create a natural looking, defined brow. If you're not into the "Instagram brows" and just want to look natural and put together, get this. The color Taupe is also the only color that works for me as a natural "dirty blonde". And it has a spooly which is not always easy to come by! Highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This is so hard to aooly without messing up because you have to press hard! Deff will not buy again and i do not recomend
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Using two colors really makes my brows look terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I'd used the Taupe color NYX Micro Brow Pencil but now that I start with this Ash Brown and then fill in with the Taupe my brows look even better and more natural. The price is better than anywhere else and the pencils are fresh and new in boxes. I'm down spending tons of $$ when NYX gives me natural-looking brows for so much less.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Eyebrow Pencil especially for natural blondes
customer_reviews.text: As a natural blond it’s difficult for me to find eyebrow pencils that aren’t too dark, waxy or ashy. I’ve been using this eyebrow pencil for years to create the natural filled in look. I have eyebrows they’re just basically so blond their invisible. This brow pencil fills my brows naturally. Plus Amazons price can’t be beat. These pencils are twice the amount at other retailers.
customer_reviews.author: WhitP

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend you try for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Before trying this brow pencil, I had been using the Benefit Cosmetics Precisely, My Brow Pencil from Ulta. The color match is exactly what I wanted and it’s so much cheaper!! It’s more of a crayon than a marker and by that I mean it’s less harsh of a line and more of a subtle fill in/defining to your brow.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Keener

customer_reviews.title: Love it but not from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyebrow pencil. I normally buy it from Ulta. I have bought a couple from Amazon and all but 1 of them have had issues. A couple broke off and kept falling out and one did not have the pencil color inside at all. Think I will go back to Ulta for this item.
customer_reviews.author: AF Williams

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite brow product!
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today and couldn’t wait to test it out. I’ve heard good things about this pencil and they were not lying! This is soo good for detail and hair like strokes. Blends really nice with my actual brow hair. Looks kinda natural which I like. The color espresso was perfect. It’s super fine point is so precise and really easy to use. And it’s so cheap! I think this is my new fav brow product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brow product...ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my overall favorite brow pencil. I’ve tried many over the years and she is my go-to. Its long lasting and easy to apply. I seal it with some brow gel and never concern myself with them again. Easy to remove at the end of day without harsh rubbing. It’s a must try at least.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dupe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dupe for a well-known brand known for its “Wiz” brow pencil. If anything, I might like this one better. Usually I find dupes leave something to be desired, but not in this case. I destroyed my eyebrows in the 90s and now need to fill them in- This pencil does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel HB

customer_reviews.title: The best eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyebrow pencil I have found. I have dark brown hair, and the tone of the espresso looks so natural- more so than any other brand I’ve tried. I like the thinness of the pencil, and the smoothness of application. I hope they never stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: great pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good pencil. I use a stencil when putting on my eyebrows and this pencil works great for getting into the tail part of the stencil. I dont think this pencil would last very long if I used it to draw on my entire eyebrow. I use just for the outline with my stencil.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ON AMAZON ONLY!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the NYX eyebrow pencil for years and have always purchased it from either Meijer or Target and it always costs like $9.99. On Amazon is was only $7.09. Talk about a great deal! I will only be ordering this product from Amazon from now on. Highly recommend, 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Dehling

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The color is fantastic and it applies really smoothly. However, it is not pigmented at all. I can't even build up the color on the areas of my eyebrow without hair, but it does work well on the parts with hair. I would NOT recommend this if you have no eyebrow hair.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Micro Brow Pencil, Eyebrow Pencil, Ash Brown
product_meta.description: Size:Pack Of 1| Color:Ash BrownBuild full beautiful brows with our ultra-thin Micro Brow Pencil. So precise it coats even the finest hairs with color for a natural-looking finish.
feature_bullets: SCULPT BEAUTIFUL BROWS: Shape, define, and fill in sparse or over-tweezed brows with our ultra-skinny Micro Brow Pencil. So precise it coats even the finest hairs with color for a natural looking finish.
SUPER SKINNY TIP: Our super skinny tip draws extra fine lines so you can easily create the look of natural brow hairs.

EYEBROWS ON FLEEK: Up your eyebrow game with NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP variety of eyebrow products. Quality creams, brow gels, eyebrow pencils, eyebrow markers, & dip eyebrow powder for different eyebrow looks.
THRIVE WITH CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: NYX PRPOFESSIONAL MAKEUP is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We do not test any of our products on animals.
PERFECT TO PAIR WITH: Try with NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Epic Eyeliner in black, for a flawless winged eyeliner look to complement those brows.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
